A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars finally has more than one strong female character. Great visuals. Puppet Yoda returns. Luke sends a Force-holo of himself to keep Kylo-Ren from destroying the Resistance.  Great fight choreography in the K & Rey vs. Snoke's guards battle. Lots of humor. And showing the next generation of rebels at the end (the boy uses the Force to grab his broom\, watches the MF go to light speed among the stars\, and wears Rose's ring with the Rebel Alliance symbol).  Can't understand why audience  rated this so low.
